summary: POWER STEERING GOES OUT WHILE DRIVING. CLEAR THE CODES AND IT WORKS FINE. HAS HAPPENED A FEW TIMES NOW. SEEN ONLINE THERE WAS A RECALL FOR THIS PROBLEM WITH SOME MILANS BUT WHEN I CALLED FORD OUR CAR WAS NOT COVERED. OUR CAR HAS THE PROBLEMS DESCRIBED IN THE RECALL ITS THE RIGHT MAKE, MODEL AND YEAR, YET IT IS NOT COVERED?? I DONT UNDERSTAND.
